analyzed: lhag ba khro rgyal de yi mdun du yang

analyzed: de nyid ji lta joms ldan da bsam byed

original: snying gar bslan pa 'khor lo bzhin du bsam //
analyzed: snying gar bslan ba khor lo bzhin du bsam
